      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Methods in model that return types with arguments of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Comment> CommentList.getCurrentList() 
      java.util.List<Comment> CommentMap.getCurrentList() 
      Methods in model with parameters of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CommentList.add(Comment comment)
      Add a Comment object to the CommentList, if a Comment with a same id already exists, then the old one will be removed before the new one been added.
      void CommentMap.addComment(Comment comment)
      Add a Comment object in the CommentMap with its own id, if Comment with the same ID exists,do nothing, notify the ArrayAdapter the data set has changed after update if the ArrayAdapter has been set.
      void Comment.addReply(Comment comment)
      Add the comment id of a reply Comment object to the reply id set.
      void Comment.setParent(Comment parent) 

    • Uses of Comment in network_io

      Methods in network_io with parameters of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Thread IoStreamHandler.addOrUpdateComment(Comment comment)
      Update a Comment with its own id to the web server, if the Comment with the same id doesn't exist, then this Comment will be added to the server.
